name: Super Depth Charge Sub Hunter Edition
name_original: Super Depth Charge Sub Hunter Edition
description:
Hi everyone, this is my take on the classic arcade game Depth Charge.  All the remakes I have seen have been disappointingly slow going, so I decided to make my own faster paced version with a few of my own ideas included as well.

The controls are detailed on the welcome screen when you run the game.  You can use either your pc keyboard or you can use an Xbox One\S\X controller connected to your pc.  

Game overview;

Move left and right to avoid submarine torpedos.

Drop depth charges to destroy the enemy submarines.

Once all submarines have been destroyed the battle will be won and you will move onto the next battle.  

Battles get more and more difficult, with more submarines and submarines of higher classes (sub class characteristics are detailed on the welcome screen for reference when you run the game).

Tip - Use your depth charges wisely, you can only drop 3 at a time!

If you are victorious in 10 battles you will be promoted to Captain and earn a bronze medal.

If you are victorious in 25 battles you will be promoted to Commander and earn a silver medal.

If you are victorious in all 50 battles you will bring the war to a victorious end, retiring with the highest rank of Admiral of the Sea and earn a gold medal.

Will you win the war?

Good luck!

I have loads of ideas for projects.  If you enjoy this game please donate.  The more donations I receive the more likely I will be able to continue developing them.  Thank you in advance and I hope you enjoy Super Depth Charge Sub Hunter Edition.
